Description: The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

Properties.Description: Allow AWS AppSync to access RDS.
Allow AWS AppSync to write logs
Allow AWS AppSync to write logs

Properties.Definition:
enum FilterWith {
  AND
  OR
}

enum NumericFilterExpression {
  in
  ne
  eq
  le
  lt
  ge
  gt
  between
  notBetween
  isNull
  isNotNull
}

enum BooleanFilterExpression {
  ne
  eq
}

enum StringFilterExpression {
  ne
  eq
  contains
  notContains
  startsWith
  isNull
  isNotNull
  in
}

input DateFilter {
  with  : FilterWith
  expression: NumericFilterExpression!
  value: [AWSDateTime!]
}

input BooleanFilter {
  with  : FilterWith
  expression: BooleanFilterExpression!
  value: [Boolean!]
}

input FloatFilter {
  with  : FilterWith
  expression: NumericFilterExpression!
  value: [Float!]
}


input IntFilter {
  with  : FilterWith
  expression: NumericFilterExpression!
  value: [Int!]
}

input StringFilter {
  with  : FilterWith
  expression: StringFilterExpression!
  value: [String!]
}

input AccountFilterInput {
  name: StringFilter
  createdAt: DateFilter
  updatedAt: DateFilter
  planId: StringFilter
  active: IntFilter
  criteria: [AccountFilterInput!]
}

enum SortOrder { asc desc }

input AccountSortInput {
  name: SortOrder
  createdAt: SortOrder
  updatedAt: SortOrder
  planId: SortOrder
  sortBy: [AccountSortInput!]
}

input UserFilterInput {
  accountId: StringFilter
  ownerId: StringFilter
  email: StringFilter
  userGroup: StringFilter
  given_name: StringFilter
  family_name: StringFilter
  createdAt: DateFilter
  updatedAt: DateFilter
  isDeleted: IntFilter
  criteria: [UserFilterInput!]
}

input UserSortInput {
  accountId: SortOrder
  email: SortOrder
  given_name: SortOrder
  family_name: SortOrder
  userGroup: SortOrder
  createdAt: SortOrder
  updatedAt: SortOrder
  sortBy: [UserSortInput!]
}

input PlanTypeFilterInput {
  ownerId: StringFilter
  cost: FloatFilter
  billingTerm: StringFilter
  name: StringFilter
  createdAt: DateFilter
  updatedAt: DateFilter
  isDeleted: IntFilter
  criteria: [PlanTypeFilterInput!]
}

input PlanTypeSortInput {
  name: SortOrder
  billingTerm: SortOrder
  cost: SortOrder
  createdAt: SortOrder
  updatedAt: SortOrder
  sortBy: [PlanTypeSortInput!]
}

input IntegrationTypeFilterInput {
  ownerId: StringFilter
  planTypeId: StringFilter
  name: StringFilter
  createdAt: DateFilter
  updatedAt: DateFilter
  active: IntFilter
  criteria: [IntegrationTypeFilterInput!]
}

input IntegrationTypeSortInput {
  name: SortOrder
  createdAt: SortOrder
  updatedAt: SortOrder
  sortBy: [IntegrationTypeSortInput!]
}

input IntegrationFilterInput {
  ownerId: StringFilter
  accountId: StringFilter
  formId: StringFilter
  active: IntFilter
  isDeleted: IntFilter
  lastExecuted: DateFilter
  lastExecutionResult: IntFilter
  createdAt: DateFilter
  updatedAt: DateFilter
  criteria: [IntegrationFilterInput!]
}

input IntegrationSortInput {
  lastExecuted: SortOrder
  createdAt: SortOrder
  updatedAt: SortOrder
  sortBy: [IntegrationSortInput!]
}

input FormFilterInput {
  name: StringFilter
  ownerId: StringFilter
  accountId: StringFilter
  createdAt: DateFilter
  updatedAt: DateFilter
  startsAt: DateFilter
  endsAt: DateFilter
  isPaused: IntFilter
  isDeleted: IntFilter
  criteria: [FormFilterInput!]
}

input FormSortInput {
  name: SortOrder
  createdAt: SortOrder
  updatedAt: SortOrder
  startsAt: SortOrder
  endsAt: SortOrder
  sortBy: [FormSortInput!]
}

input PlanFilterInput {
  accountId: StringFilter
  ownerId: StringFilter
  planTypeId: StringFilter
  lastBillDate: DateFilter
  createdAt: DateFilter
  updatedAt: DateFilter
  startDate: DateFilter
  endDate: DateFilter
  criteria: [PlanFilterInput!]
}

input PlanSortInput {
  createdAt: SortOrder
  updatedAt: SortOrder
  lastBillDate: SortOrder
  startDate: SortOrder
  endDate: SortOrder
  sortBy: [PlanSortInput!]
}

type FormEntry @model {
  id: ID!
  formId: ID!
  form: Form!
  data: AWSJSON!
  createdAt: AWSDateTime!
}

input AddFormEntryInput {
  data: AWSJSON!
}

type FormVersion @model {
  id: ID!
  accountId: ID!
  formId: ID!
  ownerId: ID!
  ownedBy: User!
  createdAt: AWSDateTime
  notes: String
  formData: AWSJSON!
}

input FormVersionFilterInput {
  accountId: StringFilter
  formId: StringFilter
  ownerId: StringFilter
  createdAt: DateFilter
  criteria: [FormVersionFilterInput!]
}

input FormVersionSortInput {
  createdAt: SortOrder
  sortBy: [FormVersionSortInput!]
}

input AddFormVersionInput {
  accountId: ID!
  formId: ID!
  notes: String!
  formData: AWSJSON!
}

type Form @model  {
  id: ID!
  ownerId: ID!
  name: String!
  description: String!
  versionId: ID
  version: FormVersion
  ownedBy: User!
  accountId: ID!
  account: Account!
  createdAt: AWSDateTime!
  updatedAt: AWSDateTime
  startDate: AWSDateTime
  endDate  : AWSDateTime
  isPaused : Int
  isDeleted: Int
  redirectNotStarted: AWSURL
  redirectHasEnded : AWSURL
  versions(limit: Int): [FormVersion]
  integrations(limit: Int): [Integration]
  entries(limit: Int): [FormEntry]
}


input AddFormInput {
  accountId: ID!
  name: String!
  description: String!
  startsAt: AWSDateTime
  endsAt: AWSDateTime
  isPaused: Int
}

input UpdateFormInput {
  id: ID!
  currentVersionId: ID
  name: String
  description: String
  startDate: AWSDateTime
  endDate: AWSDateTime
  redirectNotStarted: AWSURL
  redirectHasEnded : AWSURL
  isPaused: Int
}

input DeleteFormInput {
  id: ID!
  accountId: ID!
}

type User @model {
  id: ID!
  ownerId: ID
  ownedBy: User
  accountId: ID
  account: Account
  email: String!
  userGroup: String!
  given_name: String!
  family_name: String!
  phone_number: AWSPhone
  createdAt: AWSDateTime
  updatedAt: AWSDateTime
  isDeleted: Int
  numForms: Int
}


input UpdateUserInputData {
  group: String!
  given_name: String!
  family_name: String!
  phone_number: AWSPhone
}

input UpdateUserInput {
  id: ID!
  data: UpdateUserInputData!
}

enum AddressType {
  BILLING
  CONTACT
}

type Address @model {
  id: ID!
  name: String!
  addressee: String
  addressType: AddressType!
  phone_number: AWSPhone
  email: String!
  street: String
  city: String
  state: String
  country: String
}

type AddAddressInput {
  name: String!
  addressee: String
  addressType: AddressType!
  phone_number: AWSPhone
  email: String!
  street: String
  city: String
  state: String
  country: String
}

type Account @model {
  id: ID!
  name: String!
  addresses(limit: Int): [Address]
  website: String
  taxId: String
  ownerId: ID!
  ownedBy: User!
  plan : Plan
  planId: ID
  createdAt: AWSDateTime
  updatedAt: AWSDateTime
  active: Int
  numForms: Int
  numUsers: Int
  users(limit: Int): [User]
  forms(limit: Int): [Form]
}

input UpdateAccountInput {
  id: ID!
  name: String
}
type PlanType @model {
  id: ID!
  ownerId: ID!
  ownedBy: User!
  name: String!
  cost: Float!
  active: Int!
  billingTerm: String!
  createdAt: AWSDateTime
  updatedAt: AWSDateTime
  isDeleted: Int
}

input AddPlanTypeInput {
  name: String!
  cost: Float!
  billingTerm: String!
  active: Int!
}

input UpdatePlanTypeInput {
  id: ID!
  name: String
  cost: Float
  billingTerm: String
  active: Int
}

type Plan @model {
  id: ID!
  accountId: ID!
  account: Account!
  ownerId: ID!
  ownedBy: User!
  planTypeId: ID!
  startDate: AWSDateTime!
  endDate: AWSDateTime
  active: Int
  lastBillDate: AWSDateTime
  createdAt: AWSDateTime
  updatedAt: AWSDateTime
  planType: PlanType
  isDeleted: Int
}

input AddPlanInput {
  accountId: ID!
  planTypeId: ID!
  endDate: AWSDateTime
  active: Int
}

input UpdatePlanInput {
  planId: ID!
  accountId: ID!
  active: Int!
  endDate: AWSDateTime
}

type IntegrationType @model {
  id: ID!
  ownerId: ID!
  ownedBy: User!
  planTypeId: ID!
  planType: PlanType
  name: String!
  active: Int!
  createdAt: AWSDateTime
  updatedAt: AWSDateTime
}


input AddIntegrationTypeInput {
  name: String!
  active: Int
}

input UpdateIntegrationTypeInput {
  id: ID!
  name: String!
  active: Int
}

type Integration @model {
  id: ID!
  integrationTypeId: ID!
  integrationType: IntegrationType
  ownerId: ID!
  accountId: ID!
  formId: ID!
  form: Form!
  active: Int!
  authType: String
  auth: AWSJSON
  target: String
  method: String
  lastExecuted: AWSDateTime
  lastExecutionResult: Int
  lastExecutionResultMessage: String
  createdAt: AWSDateTime
  updatedAt: AWSDateTime
  isDeleted: Int
}


input AddIntegrationInput {
  integrationTypeId: ID!
  accountId: ID!
  formId: ID!
  active: Int
  authType: String
  auth: AWSJSON
  target: String
  method: String
}

input UpdateIntegrationTypeInputData {
  active: Int
  authType: String
  auth: AWSJSON
  target: String
  method: String
}

input UpdateIntegrationInput {
  id: ID!
  active: Int
  authType: String
  auth: AWSJSON
  target: String
  method: String
}

input OffsetLimit {
  offset: Int
  limit: Int
}

type Query {
  getAccount(accountId: ID!): Account
  getUser(userId: ID!): User
  getPlan(planId: String!): Plan
  getActiveAccountPlan(accountId: String!): Plan
  getPlanType(planTypeId: String!): PlanType
  getForm(formId: String!) : Form
  getFormVersion(versionId: String!) : FormVersion
  getIntegrationType(integrationTypeId: String!): IntegrationType
  getIntegration(integrationId: String!): Integration
  getFormEntry(formEntryId: String!): FormEntry
  listAccounts(offsetLimit: OffsetLimit, filter: AccountFilterInput, sort: AccountSortInput): [Account]
  listUsers(offsetLimit: OffsetLimit, filter: UserFilterInput, sort: UserSortInput) : [User]
  listPlans(offsetLimit: OffsetLimit, filter: PlanFilterInput, sort: PlanSortInput): [Plan]
  listPlanTypes(offsetLimit: OffsetLimit, filter: PlanTypeFilterInput, sort: PlanTypeSortInput): [PlanType]
  listForms(offsetLimit: OffsetLimit, filter: FormFilterInput, sort: FormSortInput) : [Form]
  listFormVersions(offsetLimit: OffsetLimit, filter: FormVersionFilterInput, sort: FormVersionSortInput) : [FormVersion]
  listIntegrationTypes(offsetLimit: OffsetLimit, filter: IntegrationTypeFilterInput, sort: IntegrationTypeSortInput): [IntegrationType]
  listIntegrations(offsetLimit: OffsetLimit, filter: IntegrationFilterInput, sort: IntegrationSortInput): [Integration]
  listFormEntries(offsetLimit: OffsetLimit, formId: String!) : [FormEntry]
  listFormEntriesByTime(offsetLimit: OffsetLimit, formId: String!, timestampPrefix: String!): [FormEntry]
}

type Mutation {
  addPlanType(input: AddPlanTypeInput): PlanType!
  addPlan(input: AddPlanInput): Plan!
  addIntegrationType(input: AddIntegrationTypeInput): IntegrationType!
  addIntegration(input: AddIntegrationInput): Integration!
  addForm(input: AddFormInput!): Form!
  addFormVersion(input: AddFormVersionInput!): Form!

  updatePlanType(input: UpdatePlanTypeInput): PlanType!
  updatePlan(input: UpdatePlanInput): Plan!
  updateAccount(input: UpdateAccountInput): Account!
  updateAccountPlan(input: AddPlanInput): Account!
  updateUser(input: UpdateUserInput): User!
  updateIntegrationType(input: UpdateIntegrationTypeInput): IntegrationType!
  updateIntegration(input: UpdateIntegrationInput): Integration!
  updateForm(input: UpdateFormInput): Form!

  deleteForm(input: DeleteFormInput): Form!
  deletePlanType(planTypeId: ID!): PlanType!
  deletePlan(accountId: ID!, planId: ID!): Plan!
  deleteAccount(accountId: ID!): Account!
  deleteUser(userId: ID!): User!
  deleteIntegrationType(integrationTypeId: ID!): IntegrationType!
  deleteIntegration(integrationId: ID!): Integration!

  addFormEntry(input: AddFormEntryInput!): FormEntry!
}

schema {
  query: Query
  mutation: Mutation
}

Properties.Name: GraphQlFunctionConfigurationFNparseFilter
Properties.RequestMappingTemplate:
$util.qr($ctx.stash.paths.put("Common_FN_parseFilter_REQ.vtl"))
#set($args=$ctx.arguments)
#set($identity=$ctx.stash.identity)
#set($expmap = {
  "ne" : "!=",
  "eq" : "=",
  "le" : "<=",
  "lt" : "<",
  "ge" : ">=",
  "gt" : ">"
})

#if($args.sort && $args.sort.sortBy)
    #set($sort = "")
    #foreach($sortBy in $args.sort.sortBy)
        #foreach($col in $sortBy.keySet())
            #set($order=$sortBy[$col])
            #set($clause="${col} ${order}")
            #set($suffix="")
            #if($foreach.hasNext)
                #set($suffix=",")
            #end
            #set($sort="${sort} ${clause}${suffix}")
        #end
    #end
    #set($sort = "ORDER BY ${sort}")
#end
$util.qr($ctx.stash.put("sortExpression", $sort))

#if($args.filter && $args.filter.criteria)
    #set($filter = "")
    #foreach($criteria in $args.filter.criteria)
        #foreach($col in $criteria.keySet())
            #set($entry=$criteria[$col])
            #set($values=$entry.value)
            #if($col == "accountId" && !$identity.isAdmin)
                $values.set(0, $identity.tenantId)
            #end
            #set($with="")
            #set($clause="")
            #if($foreach.hasNext)
                #set($with=$entry.with)
            #end
            #if($entry.expression == 'contains')
                #set($clause="${col} LIKE '%${values[0]}%' ${with}")
            #elseif($entry.expression == 'notContains')
                #set($clause="${col} NOT LIKE '%${values[0]}%' ${with}")
            #elseif($entry.expression == 'startsWith')
                #set($clause="${col} LIKE '${values[0]}%' ${with}")
            #elseif($entry.expression == 'between')
                #set($clause="${col} BETWEEN ${values[0]} AND ${values[1]} ${with}")
            #elseif($entry.expression == 'notBetween')
                #set($clause="${col} NOT BETWEEN ${values[0]} AND ${values[1]} ${with}")
            #elseif($entry.expression == 'isNull')
                #set($clause="${col} IS NULL ${with}")
            #elseif($entry.expression == 'isNotNull')
                #set($clause="${col} IS NOT NULL ${with}")
            #elseif($entry.expression == 'in')
                #set($clause="${col} IN (${values[0]}) ${with}")
            #else
                #set($exp=$expmap.get($entry.expression))
                #set($clause="${col} ${exp} '${values[0]}' ${with}")
            #end
            #set($filter="${filter} ${clause}")
        #end
    #end
    #set($filter = "WHERE ${filter}")
#end
$util.qr($ctx.stash.put("filterExpression", $filter))
#return

Properties.Name: GraphQlFunctionConfigurationFNgetAccount
Properties.RequestMappingTemplate:
$util.qr($ctx.stash.paths.put("Account_get_REQ.vtl"))
#set($identity=$ctx.stash.identity)
#set($args=$ctx.arguments)


#set($isAllowed = false)
#if($identity.tenantId == $args.accountId || $identity.isAdmin == true)
    #set($isAllowed = true)
#end

#if($isAllowed == true)
    $util.qr($ctx.stash.put("request", $args))
    $util.qr($ctx.stash.request.put("itemType", 'Account'))
    $util.qr($ctx.stash.put("operation", 'get'))
    {
        "version": "2018-05-29",
        "statements": [
            "SELECT * FROM Account WHERE id='${args.accountId}'"
        ]
    }
#else
    $util.error("User [${identity.callerId}] cannot execute [GET] on Account[${args.accountId}]", "Unauthorized")
#end

Properties.Name: GraphQlFunctionConfigurationFNlistAccounts
Properties.RequestMappingTemplate:
$util.qr($ctx.stash.paths.put("Account_list_REQ.vtl"))
#set($identity=$ctx.stash.identity)
#set($args=$ctx.arguments)

#if($identity.isAdmin == true)
    $util.qr($ctx.stash.put("request", $args))
    $util.qr($ctx.stash.request.put("itemType", 'Account'))
    $util.qr($ctx.stash.put("operation", 'list'))
    #set($limits = $util.defaultIfNull($args.offsetLimit, {"offset":0,"limit":50}))
    $util.qr($limits.put("offset", $util.defaultIfNull($args.offsetLimit.offset, 0)))
    $util.qr($limits.put("limit", $util.defaultIfNull($args.offsetLimit.limit, 50)))
    $util.qr($ctx.stash.put("limits", $limits))
    #set($filter = $util.defaultIfNull($ctx.stash.filterExpression, ""))
    #set($sort = $util.defaultIfNull($ctx.stash.sortExpression, ""))
    {
        "version": "2018-05-29",
        "statements": [
            "SELECT * FROM Account ${filter} ${sort} LIMIT ${limits.offset}, ${limits.limit}"
        ]
    }
#else
    $util.error("User [${identity.callerId}] cannot execute LIST on Account", "Unauthorized")
#end

Properties.Name: GraphQlFunctionConfigurationFNlistUsers
Properties.RequestMappingTemplate:
$util.qr($ctx.stash.paths.add("User_list_REQ.vtl"))
#set($identity=$ctx.stash.identity)
#set($args=$ctx.arguments)

$util.qr($ctx.stash.put("request", $args))
$util.qr($ctx.stash.request.put("itemType", 'User'))
$util.qr($ctx.stash.put("operation", 'list'))
#set($limits = $util.defaultIfNull($args.offsetLimit, {"offset":0,"limit":50}))
$util.qr($limits.put("offset", $util.defaultIfNull($args.offsetLimit.offset, 0)))
$util.qr($limits.put("limit", $util.defaultIfNull($args.offsetLimit.limit, 50)))
$util.qr($ctx.stash.put("limits", $limits))
#set($sort = $util.defaultIfNull($ctx.stash.sortExpression, ""))
#if($ctx.stash.filterExpression)
    #if(!$identity.isAdmin)
        #if($ctx.stash.filterExpression.indexOf('accountId') == -1 && !$identity.isAdmin)
            #set($filter="${ctx.stash.filterExpression} AND accountId = '${identity.tenantId}'")
        #end
    #else
        #set($filter=$ctx.stash.filterExpression)
    #end

    #if(!$identity.isAdmin)
        #set($filter = "WHERE accountId = '${identity.tenantId}'")
    #else
        #set($filter = "")

{
    "version": "2018-05-29",
    "statements": [
        "SELECT * FROM User ${filter} ${sort} LIMIT ${limits.offset}, ${limits.limit}"
    ]
}

Properties.Name: GraphQlFunctionConfigurationFNupdateAccount
Properties.RequestMappingTemplate:
## Only allow admin and account admin to update account
$util.qr($ctx.stash.paths.add("Account_update_REQ.vtl"))
#set($identity=$ctx.stash.identity)
#set($args=$ctx.arguments.input)

#set($isAllowed = $identity.isAdmin == true || ($identity.isAccountAdmin == true && $args.accountId == $identity.tenantId))
#if($isAllowed == true)
    #set($request = $args)
    $util.qr($ctx.stash.put("request", $args))
    $util.qr($ctx.stash.request.put("itemType", 'Account'))
    $util.qr($ctx.stash.put("operation", 'put'))
    {
        "version": "2018-05-29",
        "statements": [
            "UPDATE Account SET updatedAt='${util.time.nowISO8601()}' #if($args.name) , `name`='${args.name}' #end WHERE id='${args.id}'",
            "SELECT * FROM Account WHERE id ='${args.id}'"
        ]
    }
#else
    $util.error("User [${ctx.stash.identity.callerId}] cannot execute [PUT] on [Account]", "Unauthorized")
#end

Properties.Name: GraphQlFunctionConfigurationFNupdateAccountPlan
Properties.RequestMappingTemplate:
## Only allow admin and account admin to update account
## This must run after FN_createPlan
$util.qr($ctx.stash.paths.put("Account_plan_update_REQ.vtl"))
#set($identity=$ctx.stash.identity)
#set($args=$ctx.arguments)
#set($isAllowed = $identity.isAdmin == true || ($identity.isAccountAdmin == true && $args.accountId == $identity.tenantId))

#if($isAllowed == true)
    #set($request = $args)
    $util.qr($request.put("itemType", 'Account'))
    $util.qr($ctx.stash.put("request", $request))
    $util.qr($ctx.stash.put("operation", 'update'))
    {
        "version": "2018-05-29",
        "statements": [
            "CALL changeAccountPlan('$args.accountId', '$ctx.prev.result.id', '${util.time.nowISO8601()}')"
        ]
    }
#else
    $util.error("User [${identity.callerId}] cannot execute [${ctx.stash.operation}] on [${args.accountId}]", "Unauthorized")
#end

Properties.Name: GraphQlFunctionConfigurationFNgetUser
Properties.RequestMappingTemplate:
$util.qr($ctx.stash.paths.add("User_get_REQ.vtl"))
#set($identity=$ctx.stash.identity)
#set($args=$ctx.arguments)

## Only allow admin and account admin to get other users
#set($isAllowed = $identity.isAdmin == true || $identity.isAccountAdmin == true || $args.userId == $identity.callerId)

#if($isAllowed == true)
    $util.qr($ctx.stash.put("request", $args))
    $util.qr($ctx.stash.request.put("id", $args.userId))
    $util.qr($ctx.stash.request.put("itemType", 'User'))
    $util.qr($ctx.stash.put("operation", 'get'))
    {
        "version": "2018-05-29",
        "statements": [
            #if(!$identity.isAdmin)
                "SELECT * FROM User WHERE id='${args.userId}' AND accountId='${identity.tenantId}'"
            #else
                "SELECT * FROM User WHERE id='${args.userId}'"
            #end
        ]
    }
#else
    $util.error("User [${identity.callerId}] cannot execute [GET] on User[${args.userId}]", "Unauthorized")
#end

Properties.Name: GraphQlFunctionConfigurationFNdeletePlanType
Properties.RequestMappingTemplate:
$util.qr($ctx.stash.paths.add("PlanType_delete_REQ.vtl"))
#set($identity=$ctx.stash.identity)
#set($args=$ctx.arguments)

#set($isAllowed = false)
#if($identity.isAdmin)
    #set($isAllowed = true)
#end

#if($isAllowed == true)
    $util.qr($ctx.stash.put("request", $args))
    $util.qr($ctx.stash.request.put("itemType", 'PlanType'))
    $util.qr($ctx.stash.put("operation", 'delete'))
    {
        "version": "2018-05-29",
        "statements": [
            "SELECT * FROM PlanType WHERE id ='${args.planTypeId}'",
            "UPDATE PlanType SET isDeleted=1, active=0, updatedAt='${util.time.nowISO8601()}' WHERE id='${args.planTypeId}'",
        ],
    }
#else
    $util.error("User [${identity.callerId}] cannot execute [DELETE] on PlanType[${args.planTypeId}]", "Unauthorized")
#end

Properties.Name: GraphQlFunctionConfigurationFNupdatePlanType
Properties.RequestMappingTemplate:
$util.qr($ctx.stash.paths.add("PlanType_update_REQ.vtl"))
#set($identity=$ctx.stash.identity)
#set($args=$ctx.arguments.input)

#set($isAllowed = false)
#if($identity.isAdmin == true)
    #set($isAllowed = true)
#end

#if($isAllowed == true)
    #set($request = $args)
    $util.qr($ctx.stash.put("request", $args))
    $util.qr($ctx.stash.request.put("itemType", 'PlanType'))
    $util.qr($ctx.stash.put("operation", 'put'))
    {
        "version": "2018-05-29",
        "statements": [
            "UPDATE PlanType SET updatedAt='${util.time.nowISO8601()}' #if($args.name) , `name`='${args.name}' #end #if($args.billingTerm) , billingTerm='${args.billingTerm}' #end #if(!$util.isNull($args.cost)) , cost=${args.cost} #end #if(!$util.isNull($args.active)) , active=${args.active} #end WHERE id='${args.id}'",
            "SELECT * FROM PlanType WHERE id ='${args.id}'"
        ]
    }
#else
